remarks.para: One may be inoperative provided remaining system is verified to be operative before each departure.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

placard.para: Placard on rudder trim indicator: "(L) or (R) STALL WARN SYS INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

note.para: The repetitive inspection required when this item is inoperative must be documented in the Aircraft Logbook at the prescribed intervals. (Refer to GMM, Chapter 3, Section 6.)

entry.para: Conduct confidence test * of left stall warning channel. If stick shaker(s) activate, dispatch is allowed. If left stall warning channel is inoperative, conduct confidence test of right stall warning channel. If stick shaker(s) activate, dispatch is allowed.

numlitem.para: Confidence tests of the stall warning system are activated by the CMCS using the MCDU as follows:
Press LSK 1L (<STALL L SHAKER) or LSK 2L (<STALL R SHAKER) as appropriate.

note.para: A single stall warning computer activates both stick shakers. If one stall warning channel does not function at all, no deactivation procedure is required.
